Text: where could i find proper subtitles for this movie?

Thanks for this extraordinary movie! The image looks a little blueish thrughout, but I guess this is due to the source material and maybe even in the director's intent.

This torrent comes without any subtitles, Portugues or otherwise. Matching English subtitles are here: http://www.opensubtitles.org/en/download/sub/3411718
